historical.new: **{{displayName}}**'s historical stats have been checked for the first time on Statsify. Their stats will now be updated at this time every day.
historical.aboutResetting:
Click the reset button below to reset your historical stats everyday **at this time**.

**WARNING**: This will delete all of your historical stats and **cannot be undone**. 
If you want to be able to reset at a specific time checkout $t(socials.premium).
historical.aboutResettingPremium:
Click the reset button below to reset your historical stats. 

**WARNING:** This will delete all of your historical stats and **cannot be undone**.

available.blocked: Unless the name is temporarily or permanently blocked by Mojang.

invite.title: Statsify Links
invite.description: Click the link below to invite Statsify to your discord server.

games.title: Games
games.description: Statsify supports majority of the games on Hypixel. To check your stats in a game run /[game]. For example you can run /bedwars to check your bedwars stats.

leaderboards.title: Leaderboards
leaderboards.description: Statsify offers 1000s of leaderboards through the /leaderboard command. Run /leaderboard then pick the gamemode, and pick a leaderboard to view. You can hit the search button to search for a certain player or position. You can also hit the up and down buttons to view more pages.

historical.title: Historical
historical.description: Statsify lets you check your daily, weekly, and monthly stats through /daily, /weekly and /monthly. If you missed a reset you can view them by running /lastday, /lastweek, and /lastmonth.

minecraft.title: Minecraft
minecraft.description: You can view general minecraft information such as skins, uuids, capes through /skin, /uuid, and /cape respectively. Statsify also has commands to generate minecraft text through /text. View minecraft colors through /colors and preview minecraft servers through /server.

misc.title: Misc
misc.description: You can do something with statsify

deletePlayer.title: Player Deleted
deletePlayer.description: **{{displayName}}** has been removed from the database and leaderboards.

commands.daily: View your daily stats in various games
commands.weekly: View your weekly stats in various games
commands.monthly: View your monthly stats in various games
commands.yesterday: View your stats from yesterday in various games
commands.last-week: View your stats from last week's in various games
commands.last-month: View your stats from last month's in various games
commands.verify: Link your Discord and Minecraft accounts
commands.unverify: Unlink your Discord and Minecraft accounts
commands.mutuals: View your mutual Hypixel friends with another player
commands.guild-overall: View a summary of your guild's stats
commands.guild-list: View the member list of your guild
commands.badge: Change your badge for every profile
commands.theme: Change your theme for every profile
commands.theme-boxes: Change the appearance of the profile boxes
commands.theme-font: Change the font of the profiles
commands.theme-palette: Change the color palette of the profiles
commands.theme-footer-message: Change your profile's footer message. You can use https://rgb.birdflop.com to create text gradients
commands.gtbhelper: Generate a list of possible Guess The Build answers based on the given hint
commands.help: A basic description of what Statsify does for you and your server
commands.available: Check the availability of a Minecraft username
commands.cape: View someone's Minecraft and Optifine Capes
commands.colors: A list of Minecraft color codes
commands.ticket-menu: Send the ticket message to the channel

arguments.guild-query: A guild name or guild member
arguments.guild-type: The type of guild search to perform
arguments.player-leaderboard: Choose a leaderboard stat to view
arguments.server: A Minecraft server name or a server IP
arguments.reason: The reason for closing the support ticket

cooldown.title: Active Cooldown
cooldown.description: Please wait `{{time}}` before reusing `{{command}}`. Learn how to reduce cooldowns [here](https://statsify.net/premium)

alreadyVerified.title: Already Verified
alreadyVerified.description: You are already linked to a Minecraft account. Run `/unverify` to unlink your Minecraft account.

noCode.title: Missing Verification Code
noCode.description:
**How to verify**
`1.` Open Minecraft and go to the server list
`2.` Connect to `verify.statsify.net` and copy the code displayed
`3.` Head back to discord and run `/verify code:XXXX`

notVerified.title: Not Verified
notVerified.description: You have to be verified before you are able to unverify

requiredVerification.title: Verification Required
requiredVerification.description: To use this command you must be verified. Run `/verify` to verify your account.

unknown.title: An Unknown Error Occurred
unknown.description: Something went wrong, please try again later.

invalidPlayer.title: Invalid Player
invalidPlayer.description: A player by the {{type}} of `{{tag}}` could not be found!

invalidSearch.title: Invalid Search
invalidSearch.description:
We couldn't figure out what exactly you were looking for!
Enter a username, uuid, or discord mention

missingSelfVerification.title: Missing Verification
missingSelfVerification.description: To be able to run commands without supplying your username, you must be verified. To verify run and complete `/verify` and then try again.

missingMentionVerification.title: Missing Verification
missingMentionVerification.description: <@{{tag}}> is not **verified**. To mention them, they must run `/verify` to verify their account

missingPlayerVerification.title: Missing Verification
missingPlayerVerification.description: {{displayName}} is not **verified**. They must run `/verify` to verify their account

invalidGuild.title: Invalid Guild
invalidGuild.description: A guild by the {{type}} of `{{tag}}` could not be found!

noRecentGames.title: Recent Games Not Found
noRecentGames.description: **{{displayName}}**'s recent games could not be found!

noStatus.title: Status Not Found
noStatus.description: **{{displayName}}**'s Hypixel status could not be found!

unsupportedFileType.title: Unsupported File Type
unsupportedFileType.description: The file you uploaded is not a supported file type for this command

playerLeaderboardNotFound.title: Invalid Player
playerLeaderboardNotFound.description: We couldn't find the `player` you were looking for

guildLeaderboardNotFound.title: Invalid Guild
guildLeaderboardNotFound.description: We couldn't find the `guild` you were looking for

leaderboardEmpty.title: Leaderboard Empty
leaderboardEmpty.description: There are no more players for this leaderboard

leaderboardNotFound.title: Leaderboard Not Found
leaderboardNotFound.description: We can't find the `leaderboard` you are looking for!

invalidServer.title: Invalid Minecraft Server
invalidServer.description: The server you are looking for either doesn't exist or is offline

noGTBSolutions.title: No Guess The Build Solutions
noGTBSolutions.description: We couldn't find any solutions for the provided hint

invalidResetTime.title: Invalid Reset Time
invalidResetTime.description: `{{time}}` does not match the format `h:mm a`. Enter a time in the format similar to `12:00 PM` or `1:00 AM`

invalidResetTimezone.title: Invalid Reset Timezone
invalidResetTimezone.description: `{{timezone}}` is not a valid timezone. Enter a timezone similar to `EST` or `PST`

premiumRequired.title: {{emoji}} Statsify {{tier}} is required to run this command

staffOnly.title: Staff Only
staffOnly.description: This command is only available to Statsify staff members

ticketAlreadyExists.title: Ticket Already Exists
ticketAlreadyExists.description: You already have a ticket open here

invalidTicketChannel.title: Invalid Ticket Channel
invalidTicketChannel.description: You must be in a ticket channel to use this command

invalidTagName.title: Invalid Tag Name
invalidTagName.description: The tag name you provided is invalid. It is not possible to create a slash command with this tag name.

tagNotFound.title: Tag Not Found
tagNotFound.description: The tag you provided was not found.

footerTooLong.title: Message Too Long
footerTooLong.description: The message you provided is too long. It should be under 50 characters excluding color codes.

higherTierRequiredForIcon.title: Higher Tier Required
higherTierRequiredForIcon.description: You need to purchase a higher premium tier too unlock this icon

playerInput.label: Search by a Player
playerInput.placeholder: Enter a player's name, eg: j4cobi

guildInput.label: Search by a Guild
guildInput.placeholder: Enter a guild's name, eg: Bluebloods

badge.profile: This is how your badge will look on your profiles

footer.profile: This is how your footer will look on your profiles

theme.profile: This is how your theme will look on your profiles

tips.discord: $t(emojis:socials.discord) Join our **$t(socials.discord)** and get **20% lower cooldowns** $t(emojis:heart)
tips.verify: $t(emojis:check) Run `/verify` to run commands without inputting your username as well as receive **10% lower cooldowns**
tips.github: $t(emojis:socials.github) Checkout out our $t(socials.github) to view the source code!
tips.premium: $t(emojis:logos.gold) [Statsify Premium](<https://statsify.net/premium>) offers additional features such as personalized profile badges. Find the full list of benefits [here](<https://statsify.net/premium>)!
tips.invite: $t(emojis:socials.discord) Click [here](<https://statsify.net/invite>) to invite Statsify to your servers!
